```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
p <- read_html("https://www.eur.nl/en/about-eur/faculties-and-schools")
print(p)
```

```{r}
schools <- p %>% html_nodes(".field__item") %>% html_text()
```

